Texto: 
ct images demonstrate a hypodense mass within the right maxillary sinus with surrounding osseous expansion and remodeling.

mri images demonstrate a t2 hyperintense, t1 hypointense rim enhancing mass within the right maxillary sinus with surrounding osseous expansion and remodeling.
mucocele
mucocele
inverting papilloma
polyp
fungal or granulomatous sinusitis
squamous cell carcinoma
32 year old male with a history of chronic sinusitis.
